title: ScribSD+: Scribble-supervised medical image segmentation based on simultaneous multi-scale knowledge distillation and class-wise contrastive regularization
details: Y Qu, T Lu, S Zhang, G Wang - Computerized Medical Imaging and Graphics, 2024
abstract: Despite that deep learning has achieved state-of-the-art performance for automatic medical image segmentation, it often requires a large amount of pixel-level manual annotations for training. Obtaining these high-quality annotations is time-consuming …
